title: Sevendust - Chapter VII: Hope and Sorrow
description:
Chapter VII: Hope and Sorrow is the seventh studio album from alternative metal band Sevendust. The CD will be released on April 1, 2008 on the band&#039;s own 7 Bros. Records in conjunction with Warner Music Group&#039;s Independent Label Group.[1] The working title was Hope and Sorrow: The 7th Chapter but was eventually altered to Chapter VII: Hope and Sorrow.

Tracklisting:

   1. Inside - 4:36
   2. Enough - 4:34
   3. Hope (feat. Mark Tremonti of Alter Bridge) - 4:42
   4. Scapegoat - 3:55
   5. Fear - 5:06
   6. The Past (feat. Chris Daughtry) - 3:53
   7. Prodigal Son - 3:33
   8. Lifeless - 4:34
   9. Sorrow (feat. Myles Kennedy of Alter Bridge) - 4:49
  10. Contradiction - 3:25
  11. Walk Away - 6:35

ENJOY!
Go see Sevendust on tour with Saliva and Neverset, support the artist. Not the label!
